attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Germans are providing a voucher towards the purchase of a new car to keep their countrymen employed. 
Instead of giving struggling UK based car manufacturers a handout to prolong the inevitable closure - will the car makers reciprocate the goverment with a handout when the business landscape improves ? 
Provide every UK Nat Ins holder with vouchers towards a car purchase,white goods, house deposit or mortgage payment. 1. Get the housing market started which will inturn generate revenue and jobs. 2. Confidence for people to purchase white goods or new cars - green friendly 3. People can pay off or reduce their mortgage giving the banks money to lend or reduce the banks dependance on the Goverment / Bank of England.
